info.author: Konstantin Aslanidi
info.description:
Generic event processing engine. The engine provides encapsulated and adjustable implementation of multithreading and exception safety.
The implementation illustrates recipes for automated compiler-assisted prevention of race condition and starvation.
info.keywords: task scheduler event processing multithreading deadlock starvation exception safety
info.name: OTS-Scheduler
info.html_description: Generic event processing engine. The engine provides encapsulated and adjustable implementation of multithreading and exception safety. The implementation illustrates recipes for automated compiler-assisted prevention of race condition and starvation.
